long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📊 JIRA STATUS TIME TRACKER

A powerful Chrome extension that helps you track and analyze time spent in different Jira statuses, providing valuable insights into your project workflows and team efficiency.

🔑 KEY FEATURES:
- Calculate time spent in each Jira status
- Filter by project, issue type, and status
- View detailed time breakdowns for each issue
- Export data to Excel for further analysis
- Optional Assignee and Reporter tracking
- Intuitive and user-friendly interface
- Secure local data processing

💡 PERFECT FOR:
- Project Managers tracking workflow efficiency
- Scrum Masters analyzing sprint patterns
- Team Leaders monitoring process bottlenecks
- Agile teams improving their workflow
- Anyone wanting to optimize their Jira processes

🔒 SECURITY & PRIVACY:
- Works directly with your Jira instance
- No data stored externally
- Processes everything locally in your browser
- Requires only necessary permissions
- Compliant with data protection standards

🚀 HOW TO USE:
1. Install the extension
2. Open your Jira instance
3. Click the extension icon
4. Select your project and filters
5. Get instant time analysis

📈 BENEFITS:
- Identify workflow bottlenecks
- Optimize your team's processes
- Make data-driven decisions
- Improve sprint planning
- Track process improvements

⚙️ REQUIREMENTS:
- Google Chrome browser
- Active Jira Cloud instance
- Appropriate Jira permissions

🆘 SUPPORT:
Need help? We're here for you!
- Support Portal: https://atlassist.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/1/group/8/create/8

- Privacy Policy: https://atlassist.com/privacy-policy-for-jira-status-time-tracker/

💼 BUSINESS USE:
Perfect for organizations of all sizes looking to:
- Track process efficiency
- Identify improvement opportunities
- Monitor workflow patterns
- Generate time analysis reports

🔄 REGULAR UPDATES:
We continuously improve the extension based on user feedback and needs.

✉️ CONTACT:
Questions or suggestions? Contact us at contact@atlassist.com

Try Jira Status Time Tracker today and gain valuable insights into your project workflows!
